mean_en: (not used in the progressive tenses) to give the impression of being or doing something; used to make what you say about your thoughts, feelings or actions less strong; used to suggest that something is true when you are not certain or when you want to be polite
sentence: Judging by the clouds, it seems that it will rain.
sentence_trans: 根据这云层判断，似乎要下雨。
